system.requirements:
Tier 2; Agility Test
Aptitudes: Agility, Fieldcraft, Slaanesh
system.effect: Can make an Agility Test when Surprised or Ambushed, if passed, Character is not Surprised and can act normally.

description.value: Can make an Agility Test when Surprised or Ambushed, if passed, Character is not Surprised and can act normally.
